title: Life Science-Based Instructional Design for HIV/AIDS Knowledge Delivery

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental life science knowledge (cell structure, basic concepts of the immune system)
context.additional_context: An Integrated Learning Environment for Early-Career Professionals in Healthcare, Legal, and Technical Fields to Study HIV/AIDS-Related Scientific Concepts and Societal Impact Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Explain the structure of the HIV virus and its mechanism of human infection
Scientifically analyze the stages of AIDS development and the process of immune system collapse
Interpret epidemiological data to provide scientific rationale for HIV/AIDS prevention strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
